tool_description:
### Trending Hashtags API

This API gives you one of the most important datasets for social media. Trending hashtags allow you to stay ahead of your competitors. And will convince your end customers to buy your premium services.
name: Trending Hashtags
title: Trending Hashtags

api_list.name: Trends by Country

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description: It can be set to either 7, 30 or 120

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: You can get the available country codes from the Available Countries endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trending-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/api/trends/DE/7"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trending-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trending-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/api/trends/{countrycode}/{period}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trending-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Available Countries
api_list.description: List of the available countries with country code and Country name in English
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trending-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/api/trends/available-countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trending-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
